item.title: Miles Davis - My Funny Valentine
item.description:
My Funny Valentine
Sweet comic Valentine
You make me smile
with my heart
Your looks are
laughable
Unphotographable
Yet you’re my favorite
work of art
Is your figureless
than Greek
Is your mouth
a little weak
when you open it
to speak
Are you smart?
But don’t change
a hair for me
Not if you
care for me
Stay little
Valentine’s stay
Each day is
Valentine’s day-

Don’t change
a hair for me
Not if you
care for me
Stay little
Valentine’s stay
Each day is
Valentine’s day-
